comment: My folks both had the Moderna vax. One had some slight issues, one not. I had the Pfizer. Were ALL doing really well now. The only ones not doing great? My dumbass sis & her hubs who havent been vaxxed. Theyre relying on gods protection. Fucking dummies.

comment: I gave vaccinations to thousands of military men & women when I was active duty AF. I was literally an Allergy/Immunology Specialist! If you start feeling funky (in a not so great way), NSAIDS are your friend. Also? Massage that injection site. And congrats!!

comment: I got mine early afternoon and felt fine all day. The next day there was a headache (of course, it's allergy season), possible very mind fever I didn't even bother to check, and shooting pains in the joints where I already have arthritis. Really do-able, and the next day nothing.
